title: Open for Business
description: When humans forsake the temples, the gods need to find other employment. Gods in the Modern World Hades opens Brandywine Investigations after his divorce and his subsequent move to the modern world. If he was hoping for boring infidelity cases and lost dogs, heâ€™s sorely mistaken as murder and mayhem find his agency and his extended family at an astonishing rate. Canines, Crosshairs & Brandywine Investigations #1 No Enemy But Brandywine Investigations #2 Dragons, Diamonds & Brandywine Investigations #3 Please note The stories in this omnibus have been reedited, and expanded by about 18K (total). The majority of the expansions were in No Enemy But Time. Word 125,662 words Brandywine Investigations Open for Business Omnibus Family Matters Omnibus
author: Angel  Martinez
